amendment.description: To reduce the amount by which the statutory limit on the public debt is increased.

vote.text: Amendment SA 833 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 197.

action.text: Amendment SA 833 proposed by Senator Baucus 197. (consideration: CR S7094-7095; text: CR S7094) To reduce the amount by which the statutory limit on the public debt is increased.
